channel.title: What Revision Is This?
channel.description:
I really wanna develop a pk server with this revision - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ihoLwGmqu1E
This was my favourite era of pking on Rs and I'd like to be able to pk on and develop one. I'm sorry it may seem like a stupid question but I'm kinda new to all of this. If you know could you link me to a server in the Server Downloads section? Thanks guys :o

item.title: What Revision Is This?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:4, topic:470609”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=588090.msg4171157#msg4171157 date=1354368407]

602 maybe? not sure

no

looks like 525-570 something to me.
[/quote]

525 was pvp not bount hunter pvp[/quote]

when did pvp bounty hunter come out then…

Read full topic

item.title: What Revision Is This?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:3, topic:470609”][quote author=enzo42 link=topic=588090.msg4171153#msg4171153 date=1354366770]
602 maybe? not sure
[/quote]

no

looks like 525-570 something to me.[/quote]

How? x10 hitpoints came out in 602 I believe… I know it definitely was not anything lower than 590.

This looks maybe like a 614 - 640. The hitsplats are also changing around… Look at the hitsplats at 0:12 and then look at them at 0:32.

Read full topic
